text_block_list.text:
Today is Winning Ticket's debut race, a special day for the fledgling 
runner.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, guys! Thanks sooo much for coming all the way to Hakodate to 
root for me!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Of course! We'd do anything for a teammate!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This is your time to shine. And we'll cheer enough to make up for the 
members who couldn't come.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We'll hafta have one heck of a dinner after the race! Scallops and sea 
snails! Rice bowls with crab, sea urchin, and salmon roe!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: And melon parfaits! Don't forget the melon parfaits!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uh… So the food's why you really came?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what ever do you mean?! A fine meal is simply a bonus! Never 
mind that—you need to concentrate!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, right. Focus, focus… All righty, Trainer, I'm off!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Okay! This is my first step on the road to the Derby! I've got this win 
down!
Ticket heads toward her big dream, fully confident in her victory.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaagh! I looooost!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Shut it! How many times are you gonna wail about losing?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sob… Don't be so mean. We've been friends since we started at the academy. Can't you at least comfort me a little?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You'd still end up crying about it even if I did.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well, yeah—because this is my start toward the Derby, you know? 
The road's still so long, and I stumbled on the first step…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yes, you had such high hopes. I can comprehend how you must feel.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Riiight?! What am I gonna do if this means I can never get into the 
Derby?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Enough already! Losing your debut race doesn't mean your dreams are 
crushed!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I lost my debut, but I'm still gonna show everyone one day.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Precisely. You need to recover your footing. Save the despair for 
when your dream is truly quashed.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, you've got an unstoppable spirit, Taishin! And Hayahide, you 
stay cool on the outside and burn for a fight on the inside! I won't stay 
here crying!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I can't stop if I wanna win the Derby! Thanks, you two! Nothing's 
better than having friends by y-your… Uwaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: See, you ended up crying anyway! Can't you just be quiet?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Her emotions are also her strength. We'd do well to learn from that.
The team is all together, putting some needed training time in.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Nnnraaagh! To the Derbyyy!

Post-race training is usually light, but Winning Ticket is running with 
all her might as if she has an upcoming race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Goodness… Ticket has so much energy…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I thought she'd still be reeling after yesterday. That's some weird 
enthusiasm.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She said her friends helped lift her spirits. What wonderful people 
they must be to understand her dream.

It wouldn't make sense for us to dwell on a single setback when our 
sights are set on the Derby.

Since she's still running toward her dream with her head held high, I 
have to do all I can to help her achieve it!
Tickezo! Swing those arms harder!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: 'Kaaay!
Pay attention to your stride! Keep pushing it till the very end!
Pay attention to your stride! Keep pushing it till the very end!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Pushing iiiiit! To the very eeend!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff… Huff… Phew! Finished! Thanks, Trainer!
Good work. Don't forget to ice up to get rid of that fatigue.
Good work. Don't forget to ice up to get rid of that fatigue.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! But I thought I'd run just a little bit longer.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I might have lost my debut race, but my friends have helped me get 
over it, and your passionate coaching has me all fired up again…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It feels like that loss wasn't for nothing. My drive for the Derby's gotten even stronger!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What an oddball. But you're my kind of oddball.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You have to keep up with her passion, Trainer. Can you do it?

No worries. That's exactly what I intend to do. A trainer never holds 
back a racer from pushing forward. Which is why…
choice_data_list: Tickezo! You're racing again next week!
Tickezo! You're racing again next week!

text_block_list.text:
No worries. That's exactly what I intend to do. A trainer never holds 
back a racer from pushing forward. Which is why…
choice_data_list: Tickezo! You're racing again next week!
Tickezo! You're racing again next week!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Consecutive races?! That much passion could be dangerous!
Obviously your health takes priority. But I think you've got this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah… AAAGH! I'm gonna RACE!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna face this challenge head-on and push through to the 
Derby! And we'll do it as a team, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeeeeaaah!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Now Trainer's all fired up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Doubtless due to Ticket's influence. I'm rather excited to see how 
their story unfolds.
Winning Ticket's story began with a loss…
But she's only just starting out toward her goal.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And it's Winning Ticket! Winning Ticket wins the race!
Wooooo!

Winning Ticket overcomes the stress of racing two weeks in a row and 
claims her first victory!
